sentences.sContent: However, if you want to take your career to the next level, it pays to get to know your colleagues and “bosses” in person.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, if you want to take your career to the next level, it pays to get to know your colleagues and “bosses” in person.
sentences.sCn: 但是，如果你想将自己的职业生涯提升到一个新高度的话，就得亲自去了解你的同事和“老板”。
